CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 29, 1955, page 14, reads: "Halloween Frolic - These pretty young ladies, with their sponsor, Walt Harper, are busy making plans for their Masquerade Ball, Oct. 31, at the Royal Ballroom. Seated, left to right: Barbara Robinson, treasurer; Mamie Hamilton, president, and Alberta Thompson, recording secretary. Standing, left to right: Delores Stewart, corresponding secretary; Marlene Stevens, vice president; Mr. Harper and Marietta Reed, social chairman. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Members of Club 54, first row from left: Myrna Lee, Marietta Reed, Mamie Hamilton; second row: Dorothy Pridgen (Greer), unknown, Alberta Thompson, sponsor Walt Harper, Barbara Robinson, unknown, Carol Shelton, Mary Ellen Walker or Williams; third row: unknown, Yvonne Cook, Evelyn Newell, Marlene Stevens, Nancy Jones, unknown, and Delores or Dolores Stewart, posed in living room
